actions.name: Dual Wield
actions.description:
Trigger: The user declares a [Missile], [Pulse], or [Ray] attack.

Effect: The attack loses 30% of their Power and gains [2-Strike], or gain +2 to its existing [X-Strike] trait, for the rest of the user's Activation.
